name: Swati Bhatia
bio: Bhatia's thick impasto landscapes reimagine terrain as emotional geography — where deep blues meet burnt sienna in collisions of color and texture.
artistStatement: I paint the earth as it feels, not as it appears. Mountains become grief. Rivers become memory. Every landscape is a self-portrait in disguise. The paint must be thick enough to hold the weight.
exhibitions: Solo — 'Emotional Cartography', India Art Fair, Delhi, 2025

paintings.title: Horizon Breach
paintings.description: A monumental landscape where horizon line dissolves into pure chromatic sensation.
